title: S+ on support is not hard to achieve
body: Warded heaps, executed minions every chance I could, got a few kills but nothing more then most supports end up getting. Used active items every teamfight, funny thing is the system probably didn't even register me as support because I took ignite botlane which gave us tons of kill pressure early. Best part is I never play support, I hate it, but I got autofilled into the shitty role and still ended up with a top tier grade, how do you feel support mains?

replies.body:
Ive got 7 m7 champs through playing them supp. Getting an s+ is easy peasy.

For christ sakes i got m6 mordkaiser after    playing him supp for 2 games. The system just makes me laugh.
How is Yasuo in a ranked game?
Good score. Engage supports are so good right now, especially in low elo. Except for blitz, he's useless.
